pageContext.claim: “[Democrats] were actually trying to discourage people from taking [the vaccine]. That's so bad and so stupid and so dangerous.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats consistently expressed hope and support for the rapid development of a covid-19 vaccine. However, Joe Biden and others cautioned, with ample basis considering Trump's history of lies and deceit, that people should follow the advice of doctors and medical experts, and not just Trump's word, on any vaccine's efficacy and reliability.
